game.name: Barks and Bytes
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Barks & Bytes is a 4-players social deduction card game where robot prototypes undergo a testing program designed to measure stability through decision-making. Only one makes it through. The others are recycled.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Barks & Bytes is a 4-players social deduction card game where robot prototypes undergo a testing program designed to measure stability through decision-making. Only one makes it through. The others are recycled.
